scripts.deploy-buyer: concurrently 'git remote set-url origin https://github.com/Danish-Raza/buyer.git' 'git add .' 'git commit -m "deploying"'  'git push origin master' 'REACT_APP_ACCOUNT_TYPE=BUYER PUBLIC_URL=/buyer npm run deploy'
scripts.deploy-customer: concurrently 'git remote set-url origin https://github.com/Danish-Raza/dixon.git' 'git add .' 'git commit -m "deploying"'  'git push origin master' 'REACT_APP_ACCOUNT_TYPE=BUYER PUBLIC_URL=/dixon npm run deploy'
scripts.deploy-supplier: concurrently 'git remote set-url origin https://github.com/Danish-Raza/saltoris_ui_dev.git' 'git add .' 'git commit -m "deploying"'  'git push origin master' 'REACT_APP_ACCOUNT_TYPE=SUPPIER PUBLIC_URL=/saltoris_ui_dev npm run deploy'
